subtitle: I'm a eclectic guy who likes making different things with many technologies.
opening: I'm a software developer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I'm focused on building accessible, human-centered products at
intro: Sup! My name is Alisson and I enjoy creating various things on the internet. My interest in development started back in 2014 when I decided to create a few 3D things — turns out creating a few games taught me a few things about development so i got interested in!
current-work: My main focus these days is building accessible, inclusive, modern products with it's best practices and digital experiences at
front-end-intro: I like to build screens with different, challenging and groundbreaking designs focusing on accessible and inclusive
back-end-intro: I started my career as a Front-end developer due to my curiosity it awaken my interest on back-end and i figure out that it's not that hard.
languages: Languages and platforms that I develop

job.title: Software Engineer
job.html:
• Write modern, performant, maintainable code for a diverse array of client and internal projects
  • Work with a variety of different languages, platforms, frameworks, and content management systems such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Angular, Netlify, Sass, Next.JS, JQuery, Node.JS, Java, C#, .NET, etc
  • Communicate with multi-disciplinary teams of engineers, designers, producers, and clients on a daily basis

list.title: Won Games
list.html: Um curso que cria um ecommerce chamado Won Games e ajuda a entender React, Heroku, NextJS, Jest, Storybook, Cypress, TypeScript, Styled Components, React Testing Library.

list.title: Banco do Alisson
list.html: Um curso que ajuda a entender Styled Components.

list.title: Material UI Phone Number TextField
list.html: Um componente que realizei um fork, adaptei às minhas necessidades e criei um pacote npm.
